headline: Air Products Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Air Products (NYSE:APD) today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.77 per share of common stock. The dividend is payable on February 10, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on January 2, 2025.

headline: Like Passive Income? Then You'll Love These 3 Dividend Stocks.
summary: Dividends are a key way these three companies pass along profits to their shareholders.
